title: Web Applications
description: Web Application development using Web2Py and angularJS.

description: Mobile app development using Android studio and Xcode with either Java or Swift Programming languages.

title: Android Programming
description: Intermediate project based class in Java Android Development.

title: Relational Database Management
description: Introduction to managing and maintaining relational SQL databases

title: Introduction to Algorithms and Data Structures

title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence Algorithms
